prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Bass, Piano, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features Piano, Drums, Bass, and Guitar, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Guitar, Bass, and Piano, but Reed is absent.

Style 3:
This piece has Drums, Guitar, Bass, and Piano, Reed excluded.
